long_description: The coated ripstop polyester Big Agnes Big House 4 footprint helps protect the floor of your Big House 4 tent from wear and abrasion, so you can enjoy your tent on camping trips year after year. Footprint is precisely sized to help prevent pooling of water under tent during wet weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: The coated ripstop polyester Big Agnes Big House 4 footprint helps protect the floor of your Big House 4 tent from wear and abrasion, so you can enjoy your tent on camping trips year after year.
